objects.text:
925 Sterling Silver Craftsmanship
Delicate Pink Drop Design
Perfect Gift for Loved Ones
6 Month Warranty Included

Adorn Her with Elegance
Gift the Essence of Love

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*

banner_details:
This banner features a clean and elegant jewelry promotion layout with a soft and romantic visual theme. The composition is structured with a centered product image (`product_image`) showcasing intricate earrings, framed by serif and sans-serif text layers that highlight the luxurious appeal. The title (`heading`) is bold and uppercase, followed by a refined subtitle (`subheading`) and a prominent product name (`product_name`), all arranged to establish hierarchy. Supporting text layers include a product description (`description`), a poetic tagline (`tagline`), a highlighted price (`price`), and a call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`). The layered soft rectangular and wavy background enhances visual depth.

**Color Palette:**
- Blush Pink: `#FFF5F5`
- Dusty Rose: `#D47C7C`
- Pale Pink: `#E8A9A9`
- Charcoal Brown: `#5D4B4B`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases elegant earrings featuring a delicate blend of rose gold, blush pink, and sparkling white tones. The primary color is a soft rose gold (#F4A6A6), which forms the structural base and outlines, creating a luxurious and warm feel. Blush pink (#F7C6C7) highlights the teardrop elements, adding a feminine and graceful touch. The clear, gem-like stones reflect light and range from crystal white (#FFFFFF) to icy silver hues (#E0E0E0), enhancing brilliance and contrast. For an advertisement banner, this palette can be balanced with a white or pastel pink background to maintain a premium, romantic aesthetic that highlights these vibrant elements.
